column4: I have a problem with my netbook. For some reason, I am not able to plug and play usb sticks or my external dvd player. It says unable to mount, not authorised. I have tried going into Systen, Administration, Users and Groups. It wont allow me to click on the Advanced Settings, it does nothing. Plus I have tried opening it via the terminal using sudo users-admin that opens the box, but it just hangs and does nothing. I am tryin g to do a fresh insta
ll and am running out of options. Can somebody help please?
i'd do that too :) OS issues.
i was aware of issues long ago with storage devices being NTFS locked i.e not safely removed from windows not working properly, but im sure the bunt team has fixed this since.
